ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Charming Questions
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Level 27 when you first get it.  I was charming HGs and SGs with fair success at level 28... ... These 2 were my very first experiment the moment I got the
ygData.messageBody:
roleplay@... wrote:

> Well spent most of my time this weekend trying to get Charm fighting down with Griffawns and
> Griffenes in NK. I have a couple of questions:
>
> 1. I noticed (and assume) that killing Griffawns got the Griffenes to spawn. Are they like Cyclops
> in the Rather Mtn's were you have to basically kill everything (bears, etc) to get more to spawn?
>
> 2. What is a good level to start trying to charm cyclops in the Rathe Mtns? I tried on a yellow and
> was unsuccessful about 10 times in a row.

Level 27 when you first get it. I was charming HGs and SGs with fair success at level 28...

>
>
> 3. Froon and Choon in WK. Do I have a reasonable shot and charm fighting these 2 against each other?

These 2 were my very first experiment the moment I got the song at level 27 (after trying for 10 minutes
to get some help to take them out I was just curious if I could get it to stick and was very surprised
when it did). Took awhile to finish off the winner, but it fun and I got my lambent vambraces and boots
out of the deal. They both were con-red at the time.

Taneran Dreamweaver
<Clan Jax>
Bard of the 48th song (stalled out! DOH! too many raids :( )
Prexus
